heading: Church music.
alt-heading: Sacred vocal music. History and criticism.
general-note: Here are entered works on church music and on sacred vocal music in general. Sacred vocal compositions are entered under the heading. Sacred vocal music. and headings referred to under that heading..
Subdivided, when desirable, by denomination as well as by locality, e.g.. 1. Church music--Church of England. 2. Church music--England..
